short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to clear various types of browsing data like history, cache, cookies, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Cleaner: Keep Your Browser Fast and Private!

Keep your browser running smoothly and protect your privacy with the Browser Cleaner extension. With just a few clicks, you can clear your browsing history, cache, cookies, and more—customized to your needs!

Key Features:
• Clear All Data (Last Week): Remove all browsing data, including history, cookies, cache, and more from the past week to keep your browser fast.
• Clear All Time Data: Wipe your entire browsing history, cookies, cache, and other data from the beginning of time. Perfect for a fresh start!
• Targeted Cleaning: Clear specific data like cookies or cache without affecting your entire browsing history.
• One-Click Solutions: Simple, intuitive interface that allows you to clean up your browsing data with a single click.
• Customizable Options: Choose what to delete—whether it's today's browsing history or all-time data, you're in control!

Why Use Browsing Data Cleaner?

• Improve Performance: Clearing out old cache and data can speed up your browser.
• Enhance Privacy: Protect your personal information by removing traces of your online activity.
• User-Friendly Design: Easy to use, even for beginners. Clear explanations and tooltips ensure you know exactly what you're cleaning.
